name: Physic DUSTraction
description:
You are a brave cleaners and you must let that dust know its place

Take your water guns and shoot them

But sometimes that trash may be usefull...

Control

AD - movement

Esc - main menu

R  - reload level

Left mouse button -  shoot

Space - jump

Game made by
Programming, music, game design: Rehsat
Graphic arts: Rehsat, Andes
